name: Ricky Iwasaki
title: Unjiniyela Wesoftware
summary: Umsunguli weSoftware Lonelwati, lofuna litfuba lelisha lekusebenta emaphrojekthi lamakhulu. Unenshisekelo yekwakha nobe kwengeta ikhodi kute labanye bayisebentise. Ngikholwa kutsi emakhono ami mancane uma acatsaniswa ne-inthanethi, ngako-ke nginenshisekelo lenkhulu yekusebenta nalamanye emathuluzi, tinsita, tilwimi tekuhlela.

experience.title: Unjiniyela Wesoftware
responsibilities: Kwakhiwe futsi kusetjentiswe tinhlelo tekusebenta tewebhu letilinganisekako kusetjentiswa i-React ne-Node.js
Kubambisane nebaphatsi bemikhicito kucolisa tidzingo kanye nekucinisekisa kuletfwa ngesikhatsi
Kutfutfukiswe futsi kugcinwe ema-API e-RESTful etinhlelo tekusebenta tewebhu
Kutfutfukisiwe imibhalo yekwenta imisebenti ngekuzenzakalela kanye nekutfutfukisa kusebenta kahle

experience.title: Umceceshi Lositako We-Tennis
responsibilities: Kufundzisa tindlela te-tennis ecenjini lebadlali laba-5-10
Kwenta sifundvo sibe mnandzi futsi sijabulise badlali
Umsebenti wekuphepha kwebadlali enkhundleni, ikakhulu badlali labancane nalabadzala, njengalabaneminyaka lengu 3 kanye nalabaneminyaka lengu 60

experience.title: Umlingani Lophumako
responsibilities: Kusita emakhasimende kutsi atfole tintfo esitolo
Kugcina indzawo yekugcina tintfo ihlantekile futsi ihlelekile
Kugcina indzawo lephephile nalenebungani kumakhasimende netisebenti

projects.name: Iphothifoliyo
projects.description: Iwebhusayithi lephendvulako lekhombisa emaphrojekthi nemakhono asebentisa tebuchwepheshe besimanje bewebhu
